guest.title: Create your account
guest.description: To perform this action, you need to create an account. It's quick and free!
guest.loginSubtitle: Sign in to your account to continue

register.title: Create account
register.subtitle: Enter your information to create your account.
register.nameMinLength: Name must have at least 2 characters
register.ageMinimum: You must be at least 18 years old
register.passwordMinLength: Password must have at least 6 characters
register.genericError: Failed to create account. Please try again.

forgotPassword.title: Password recovery
forgotPassword.subtitle: Enter the email registered to your account below. We will send a reset code.
forgotPassword.emailNotFound: Email not found. Please check and try again.
forgotPassword.genericError: Failed to send email. Please try again.

verifyOTP.title: Code verification
verifyOTP.subtitle: Enter the 6-digit code sent to
verifyOTP.expiredCode: Invalid or expired code. Please request a new one.

newPassword.title: New password
newPassword.subtitle: Enter your new password below. Choose a strong password with letters and numbers.
newPassword.genericError: Failed to update password. Please try again.
newPassword.passwordMinLength: Password must have at least 6 characters
newPassword.passwordNeedLetter: Password must contain at least one letter
newPassword.passwordNeedNumber: Password must contain at least one number

home.comeBackLater: Come back later to see new profiles.
home.loadError: Failed to load creators. Please try again later.

changeName.title: Change name
changeName.label: Full name
changeName.genericError: Failed to save name. Please try again.
changeName.minLength: Name must have at least 2 characters

changeEmail.title: Change email
changeEmail.label: New email
changeEmail.disclaimer: You will receive a confirmation email at the new address before the change takes effect.
changeEmail.successSent: We sent a confirmation link to
changeEmail.successInstructions: Click the link to complete the change.
changeEmail.genericError: Failed to change email. Please try again.

changePassword.title: Change password
changePassword.hint: The new password must have at least 6 characters and be different from the current one.
changePassword.successMessage: Your password has been updated successfully.
changePassword.genericError: Failed to change password. Please try again.
changePassword.newMinLength: New password must have at least 6 characters
changePassword.sameAsOld: New password cannot be the same as the current one

creator.notFound: Could not load profile. Please try again.
creator.videoCallDisclaimer: The service provider has the right to decline the call if the client does not comply with the terms of use.
creator.videoCallOnline: This user is online and you can start a video call now.
creator.messageError: Could not open the conversation. Please try again.
creator.checkoutError: Failed to create checkout. Please try again.
creator.ticketError: Failed to purchase ticket. Please try again.
creator.packError: Failed to purchase pack. Please try again.

conversations.title: Messages
conversations.emptyHint: Your messages with creators will appear here

page.title: Conversation
page.emptyHint: Send a message to start the conversation

subscription.title: Subscription
subscription.loadError: Failed to load plans. Please try again.
subscription.checkoutError: Failed to start checkout. Please try again.
subscription.noPlansNow: No plans available at the moment.

coupons.title: Coupons
coupons.emptyHint: Your coupons will appear here when available.
coupons.loadError: Failed to load coupons. Please try again later.

financial.title: Financial
financial.loadError: Failed to load transactions. Please try again.
financial.empty: No transactions in the selected period.

purchases.title: Purchases
purchases.emptyPacks: You haven't purchased any packs yet.
purchases.emptyLives: You haven't purchased any live tickets yet.
purchases.emptyCalls: You haven't scheduled any calls yet.
purchases.loadError: Failed to load purchases. Please try again.

savedCards.title: Payment Cards
savedCards.removeError: Failed to remove card. Please try again.
savedCards.emptyHint: Add a card to make your payments easier.
savedCards.loadError: Failed to load cards. Please try again.

addCard.title: Add Card
addCard.comingSoonDescription: Card registration is being implemented with secure Stripe integration. For now, payment is made directly at checkout.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.allRead: All notifications have been marked as read
notifications.allCaughtUpHint: No unread notifications. You're all caught up.
notifications.emptyHint: When you have notifications they will appear here.

booking.noSlots: No time slots available at the moment.
booking.slotTaken: This slot has already been booked. Please select another.
booking.slotPast: This time has already passed. Choose a future time.
booking.error: Error booking call. Please try again.

callRoom.title: Video Call
callRoom.unauthorized: You do not have permission to access this call.
callRoom.roomOpensEarly: The room opens 5 minutes before the scheduled time. Come back at {{time}}.
callRoom.callPast: This call has already passed its scheduled time.

contentPage.loadError: Error loading content. Please try again.

notFound.title: Page not found
notFound.description: The page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved.
